page.title: 20HOLIDAY BROCHURE
page.content: Holiday in Peace. Holiday in our area. Visit the sandy beach at Backaskail. See the seals and watch the birds. Look at the boats down at the pier. Watch the planes landing & taking off. Have a good meal at the restaurant. Get a Take-Away from the Chip Van. Have a drink in the local pub. Buy some gifts at Kettletoft Store. Enjoy a creamy bun from the Bakery. Hire a bike from the garage. Go a run. Climb up Fea Brae and see the view. Borrow a book from the library. Visit one of the farms. Look at the Churches and church sites. Holiday in our area. Holiday in Peace.
